themes.title: Machine learning
themes.text: Machine learning is an application of artificial intelligence (AI) that provides systems the ability to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.

themes.title: Big data
themes.text: Big data is a term that describes the large volume of data – both structured and unstructured , that inundates a business on a day-to-day basis. But it’s not the amount of data that’s important.

themes.title: Deep learning
themes.text: Deep learning is an artificial intelligence (AI) function that imitates the workings of the human brain in processing data and creating patterns for use in decision making.
